content.html: I'm using Wordpress 2.3, PHP 5.1.6, and the latest from wp-openid trunk (revision 20593). I'm getting a fatal error when trying to activate the plugin. Fatal error: Call to undefined method Log_error_log::error() in /var/www/vhosts/liferain.com/httpdocs/id/ShackDougall/wp-content/plugins/openid/interface.php on line 36 In case it's helpful, here's a link to my server's phpinfo. The fatal error is some kind of misconfiguration in logging, I guess, but if you look at line 36, it looks like the line that's failing is if( !$this->logic->enabled ) { // Something broke, can't start UI. I'm not sure how to proceed. Any thoughts?
